description: This file implements functions for the Persistent Storage Manager (PSM) related to the System Registry object within the Common Component Software Platform (CCSP). It includes functions to enable/disable file synchronization and to handle notifications of repository events such as folder or record changes.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PsmSysroSysRamEnableFileSync(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,BOOL bEnabled)
methods.description: Enables or disables file synchronization, adjusting the reference count accordingly.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PsmSysroSysRamNotify(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSysRepFolder,ULONG ulEvent)
methods.description: Handles notifications for repository folder or record events to trigger a flush if needed.
